translations.text: You are blocking my way!
Excuse me~
Sorry~ In a hurry~
Not in the mood to talk now.
Do I know you?
You are blocking my way!
Get lost~
Sorry~ In a hurry~
Not in the mood to talk now.
Do I know you?
You are blocking my way!
Excuse me~
Sorry~ In a hurry~
Not in the mood to talk now.
Do I know you?
Do you have 15 seconds? I am sure you will benefit from this. 300 carrots at least.
No problem!
No thanks!
Let’s have a talk.
You sure?
It’s not going to take long~ Just give me 15 seconds. I can give you a brief explanation about this savings plan.
I am interested! Tell me more.
No thanks!
Here’s my name card, call me if you need anything.
Your loss, buddy!
You are blocking my way!
Excuse me~
Sorry~ In a hurry~
Not in the mood to talk now.
Do I know you?
You are blocking my way!
Excuse me~
Sorry~ In a hurry~
Not in the mood to talk now.
Do I know you?
You are blocking my way!
Excuse me~
Sorry~ In a hurry~
Not in the mood to talk now.
Do I know you?
You are blocking my way!
Excuse me~
Sorry~ In a hurry~
Not in the mood to talk now.
Do I know you?
You are blocking my way!
Excuse me~
Sorry~ In a hurry~
Not in the mood to talk now.
Do I know you?
You are blocking my way!
Excuse me~
Sorry~ In a hurry~
Not in the mood to talk now.
Do I know you?
You are blocking my way!
Excuse me~
Sorry~ In a hurry~
Not in the mood to talk now.
Do I know you?
Omg! I could totally eat 10 packs of this.
Every time I eat this, I feel so energized!
Here have some~ Don't just watch me.
Munch~~ Munch~~ Munch~~
They should totally produce a bigger bag of chips~ This pack cant even fill one tenth of my stomach~
Now’s waiting time.
It’s about time a fish got hooked.
Depending on what bait you use, it will affect what fish you catch.
Shall give you a tips on fishing.
Once the bait is on the hook, cast the line into the water immediately.
No time to waste.
Nothing can compare to fishing during such a good weather.
Do you know about laws of attraction? If you think that you are going to catch a big fish, a big fish is more likely to get caught by you.
How were the days like when you are in the town?
Party all day everyday~
Working all day everyday~
Really? I'm not really a fan of partying...
Sounds tiring.
What tea do you want to order?
A Oolong please~
How about some Matcha~
One Oolong for Tsuki! And One Matcha! Momo!
Two Matcha please~ Momo!
This tea is so good~
Matcha is the best~
Two Matcha please~ Momo!
Fly Butterfly Fly!
Omg! The kite is flying soo high!!
Hi! I am Chi! Haven seen you around town. You are?
I am Tsuki!
For me to know for you to find out!
Nice to meet you Tsuki!
Hmm! That's rude!
The kite makes me feel free...
So nice~ Looking at the kite soaring in the air!
How I wish I had one like this~
You can have mine!
We could go get one at Yori's stall one day!
Omg! Omg! You sure???
Thank you sooo muchhhh! Tsuki!!
Yeah, we probably could...
It's alright... Don't nid dig all over to find it. Maybe it's lost.
Is red your favourite color?
Even your kite is red!
The weather is so nice today!
If only every day could be like this.
How many times did we come here to fly this butterfly?
7 times? 8 times...?
Erm... Ermm...
Did we?
We have been friends for so long~
I am pretty sure there are at least 5 times.
Fly Butterfly! Fly!
Have you wondered what will happen if you release the kite in the air?
It will definitely soar higher and higher!
It will drop of course~
I think so too! It will definitely reach outer space!
Nooooo!! It will fly all the way to the moon.
Did we?
We have been friends for so long~
How much did you bought the kite for?
It looks pretty expensive… I could probably buy a few books with that amount of carrots.
Did we?
We have been friends for so long~
All you need after a hardcore training is some dessert!
Slurp~ Slurp~ Slurp~
This is the best dessert ever!
You can never find this kind of dessert back in Mushroom Village...
The next time when you come back I will be on the podium holding the gold medal for the World Boxing Championship.
Hey! You are Tsuki right! You look a lot like your grandpa...
I have heard a lot about you.
Hope to see you around!
How's your day, Tsuki?
Your grandpa used to love fishing by the mermaid coast just east of the village.
You should head there sometime, the scenery there is amazing.
We are open! Feel free to come in.
Grrr... I am reading my newspaper. Shoo~
How you doing, Tsuki? Have you gotten used to the life in Mushroom Village?
It's pretty peaceful here.
It's sooo different from city life.
Yeah, it's very peaceful here. You should head up the mountain to visit Rondo's Kyudo.
However, it's only open in the morning though.
Take your time, you will eventually get used to it.
Come in and have a look! Maybe you will end up finding something you like.
Alright I shall have a look!
Maybe next time.
Come in! Come in!
Alright...
Hey Tsuki, did you read the news today?
A fire has occurred in the forest near the village!! Hope it doesn't spread all the way here.
If it gets any closer we might lose our homes...
Hey Tsuki! Have you been to the Tranquil Garden yet? It’s the perfect place to have a picnic.
Maybe some days you could bring my daughter, Pipi, out for a walk.
Hey Tsuki! Have you been to The Great City? I heard it’s like heaven there!
There are super high buildings stretching into the sky! Super fast transport as fast as lighting!
Hey Tsuki! How's the farm?
Good harvest all year around~
I keep forgetting to harvest my carrots...
Then you can afford to buy more things from my shop! Haha!
You'll get used to the farm life soon...
Hey Tsuki! Are you free later?
Want to accompany an old fox to go fishing?
I could join you for awhile.
Maybe next time, I have something on later.
Hope you won’t get too bored.
Sigh... this generation...
Hey, but you don’t have a fishing rod? You should grab one from my stall. Not free of charge of course...
Hey Tsuki. Have you tried swimming to the next island east of the village?
You know when I was younger, your grandpa and I used to compete who can swim across to the next island faster!
I won every single time. HAHAHA!
Hey Tsuki, come come, I got a story to tell you.
Do you have some time to listen to an old man's story?
I always have time for one of your stories!
Eh... maybe another time.
I still remember, when I was about 12 years old, my dad bought me a fishing rod for my birthday.
From then on, I started fishing every day, your grandpa started fishing together with me after a while and we became fishing buddies.
We would meet up and fish at least thrice a week. I still remember those days...
Hmmph...
Tsuki! Come come come. I got something to tell you.
This legendary Star shooter is something you can’t find in Mushroom Village. I secretly asked Frank to import from the nearby town.
I’m going to give it to you because you've been a great friend to this old man...
Faster, hide it away! Don’t let anyone know that I gave it to you, it's not exactly... legal...
Boomm~ Boom~~
What are you looking at kid!
You look familiar. Do you know who Bobo is?
You know Bobo? Are you from Mushroom Village? I haven’t seen you before.
Shall get back to training! Talk to you later.
You said you are Tsuki right? It’s rare to see a Mushroom Villager in The Great City.
How have I never seen you when I was back in the village?
I moved there from the city a while back.
Maybe because you didn’t notice me.
Oh~ No wonder.
Really? Maybe you are too irrelevant...
I haven't been back to the Mushroom Village for 10 years. Wonder how much it changed...
Did my old man ask you to come find me?
Yeah. He said he misses you.
Nope.
That’s impossible. He only cares about his Kyudojo.
He only cares about that stupid Kyudojo.
Want to give it a go? I am about to leave.
Time for the rabbit to pump!
Nope~
That’s the spirit! Show me what you can do!
Weak!
You don’t have the BEON Arcade card yet? Go get one.
Hey Tsuki! How is Mushroom Village now. Is the Mermaid lighthouse still there?
Yeah! That lighthouse is beautiful.
It got hit by a typhoon recently.
I'll tell you a secret! When I was younger, I doodled on the back of the lighthouse. Wonder if it is still there...
What??? A typhoon? Mushroom Village had never encountered a typhoon.
I am still going for a few more rounds. You can go for a few rounds of motorcycle racing if you want.
Alright! Time to race!
I don’t really like it.
I will be done soon!
Alright! Then you're gonna have to wait.
You don’t have the BEON Arcade card yet? Go get one.
I have never regretted leaving Mushroom Village and migrating to The Great City!
I am still not a champion Boxer yet. But one day, I will become the strongest boxer in the world!
What are you doing after this? Want to have some dessert?
Let’s go!
Not today.
Let me treat you this time.
Alright! Another day then.
I am going to be a famous boxer and make my dad say he's proud of me...
TsukI! One day I am going to be the best boxer in the world! Here’s a pair of boxing gloves.
They even have my autograph on them! When I become famous those are going to be worth a lot! Here have it!
Yeah, they're exactly your size haha~
It’s my turn to rest you want give it a go? Do you have the BEON Arcade card?
Yeah I have it!
Nah I don’t have it!
Carry on!
Go get it from The Great Mart! It’s cheaper to get it from there I reckon.
Pshhh! Pshhh! Pshhh! Boom!!!
Yeah it's your size! I specially bought it for you.
Can’t you see I am boxing? Don't mess with the best~
Yeah it's your size! I specially bought it for you.
We should totally do this everyday.
We can catch up on what’s going on in each other's lives.
How’s everything guys? Anything to update?
You guys know my dad. I think he wants to expand the village reach to the outside world by building a pier.
I am so against it! I just want some peace~
This is a good tea session! With my two closest friends in the village!
There’s no one else our age in this village.
Mmm!! Oolong is the best tea.
I could do this all day long.
I always get amazed by how they can stuff all those animals in that tiny box!! What sorcery is this?
Omg! They changed what happened!! That isn’t what the main character says in the book!
It’s so funny!! Hue~ Hue~ Hue~
The show is so nice!
I already know what’s going to happen at the end.
Really? What happens?
No spoilers~
They all die...
Okay...
Hey, little cute rabbit!!! Want a toy??? GIMME 100 CARROTS!!!!!
Okay! Gimme!
No thanks!
WOOHOO!!! QUICK! SPIN MY KNOB!
Aww... Come back next time!
WOOH- ... Wait... You don't have enough carrots!
Hi there! Cute rabbit! Want some OmuNoodles! Best Omu dishes in the city!
Seat for one please~
Maybe next time.
Come in! Here~
You are going to regret oh~
Would you like to do some survey for the stall? Would only take 15 to 30 seconds. You can have 100 carrots for your trouble.
Sure!
Not today.
Thank you so much!
It's alright.
Come in for the best Omu dishes in the city!
One Signature OmuNoodles!
Not now.
Table 14 for this young rabbit!
You can always come back next time!
Zzz… Zzz…
I am not sleeping! I am- umm... thinking about life.
How have you been all these years?
It's been such a long time, and we rarely get any visitors here in the Mushroom Village.
I wonder, do you know how to work the carrot farm?
When your carrots are ready to be harvested, tap it! Tapping a carrot is hard work but I'm sure a young healthy bunny like you can do it!
Try tapping the carrot now!
Very good! You remind me so much of your grandpa...
Speaking of your grandpa, have you talked with Yori yet? He's still running the knickknack shop in the Village center!
In fact, why don't we head over to see him now?
Let's go!
Do you want to invite Moca over? He loves tea the most!
Sure! Why not?
He would be here already if he’s not busy.
I will give him a shout!
Yeah! You know him the best! He’s probably busy doing something for his dad.
What tea do you want to order?
A Oolong please~
How about some Matcha~
One Oolong for Tsuki! And One Matcha for me! Momo!
Two Matcha please~ MOMO!
Where do you want to go after this?
Maybe we can go fly kites together?
Let’s just chill here.
Let’s go!
Sounds good.
But I don’t have a kite. You don’t have as well right?
Drinking Matcha makes me feel like I am in heaven.
We should do this more often.
Hey there! I’m Moca. What is your name?
Cool! Nice to meet you. Tsuki!
Do you want some tea, Tsuki?
Sure! I will have some.
Maybe another time
Enjoy the healing power of tea.
You are missing out~~~
You look so tan today Tsuki, working hard at the farm!
Did you know that there are more than 3000 types of tea?
Cool!
No way!
Yeah there really are!
There are. I have only experienced about 20.
Which tea do you prefer?
Chrysanthemum Tea
Oolong Tea
I prefer Oolong, but that is nice too.
Mine too!
I am not done with this amazing tea. How about later?
Aaahh! Drinking tea warms the body.
There is nothing quite like a freshly brewed pot of tea to get you going in the morning.
I would like to have some tea in peace.
Sit down for a cup of tea?
Sure!
Not today.
Have a sit.
Alright.
Tsuki! It has been so long since we first met.
It makes me think back to the first day you arrived at the village.
I have something for you.
It’s an antique clock.  My house have tons of antiques, so I shall give this to you as our token of friendship!
Alright.
Hey you there! First time seeing you around!
I am Ken, the buff and badass bouncer here!
You better not be doing anything illegal here! I'm watching you...
phrrrr~
A puff a day keeps your muscles buff!
ID please~
ID please~
I've seen you before but still... it's a policy...
Hey Tsuki! How are you doing today?
You look so handsome today! I am falling for you~
Do you by any chance have 50 carrots to spare?
Of course, handsome rabbits are rich!
Ermmm. . . Not really!
Thank you so much! I will return you soon.
I think it was a trick of the light. You don't look as handsome anymore.
Hey! If you don't have any money, don't need to pretend to have it!
Hey Tsuki! You know~
Ya ... I ... Recently.... Am a bit.. Tight on cash....
Do you mind lending me 250 carrots?
Yeah no problem!
Where's the money you borrowed before...
Thank you sooooo much, Tsuki! Wink*
Really? Do I owe you money? I don't remember.
Thank you soo- Wait a minute... You are also broke...
Do you know who’s the owner of this bar?
No one else in the village knows, except for me. Do you want to know?
Tell me! Tell me!
Nah~ I am not interested.
I am not gonna tell you~ Kid~
Even if you were interested, I'm not telling.
Hey Tsuki! What you doing up so late?
Want to come in for a drink? I could smuggle you in if you want~ Since there aren't many customers tonight
Really? I can??
Maybe next time.
Just this once.
Don’t regret it~
Boss! Boss Tsuki!! I forgotten to bring my wallet.
Do you have 10 carrots to spare?
Here, have it! But don’t do anything bad.
No -No~ You are using it to buy smokes.
Thank you so much! Boss!
I am not!! I am going to…
Not telling you since you aren't going to lend me anyway!
It’s alright I will ask someone else.
Do you like to drink? I may be working at a bar but I hate drinking!
Seen so many bad things happen when people drink...
I know many secrets of this village. But I am not going to tell you.
It may cost you your life.
Did you hear what happened yesterday at the bar? Some drunk tourist was throwing our martini glasses all over the place!
I went in. Bamm! Knocked him out in one punch and threw him out of the bar!
Hey! If you don't have don't need to pretend to have it!
Pssst~ Psssst~ Tsuki~~
I know a deadly secret that may cost my life and yours. Are you interested in knowing it?
Tell me! I can keep it a secret.
Don’t tell me! Don’t tell me…
The owner of the Geisha bar is actually a Yakuza boss.
This village isn’t as simple as you think it is...
It's alright. It’s safer for you not knowing.
Tsuki! Guess what!!
I won the lottery!!! Do you still remember how much I owe you?
It’s alright, here is 1000 carrots. It should be much more than how much I owed you.
Thanks Ken!!
It’s alright you can keep it.
No worries, thanks for all the times you lent me money.
Really?? Love you so much, Tsuki!
Tsuki, how you doing~ Did your house... get robbed recently?
I heard that there’s a thief going around stealing stuff in the midnight.
Anyways if you need any help just call me. I will be over right away.
Young one...
Name's Rondo.
From what I have observed, Young one.
You will need to learn some martial arts.
It helps with your... ahem... weight loss.
Rondo.
Do you think Bobo should come back and be a filial son?
He should respect his dad’s decision.
No, he has the right to live his own life
Of course he should. Old people know best...
Disrespectful! [Gets ANGRY]
I enjoyed teaching my son martial arts, until he ran away...
His name is Bobo.
My other son... nevermind...
Disrespectful! [Gets ANGRY]
I want my son Bobo to inherit my kyudojo but he ran off to open some stupid noodle place.
Makes me so ANGRY.
Hi there. Young one.
Learning martial arts will improves focus and restraint.
Always respect your elders... Don't be like my son, Bobo.
... (ignores you)
I actually have another estranged son...
But nevermind about him...
There have been a few evil survey marketers hanging around Mushroom Village.
Watch out for them, they will waste your time...
Quiet! You are going to scare away the fish.
The technique of catching fish is to stay calm and be water my friend~
Hey! You are Tsuki right! You look a lot like your grandpa.
I have heard a lot about you.
Hope to see you around!
What are you doing by the coast?
Did you come here to fish as well?
Is your hobby fishing too?
Did you know your grandpa used to come here to fish.
Hey Tsuki! Want to join me fishing?
Sure why not!
Not today.
Have a sit.
Alright. Join me anytime when you are free.
You don’t have a fishing rod?
You should get one from the stall.
Do you know that fishing is not just a test of patience?
It’s also a test of skills, whether you or the fish will win the battle in the end.
Sometimes life’s not just about earning carrots. It’s about being happy.
Sometimes less is more.
Did you know that different weather conditions will attract a different type of fish.
Tsuki! Come come come. I got something to tell you.
This legendary Star shooter is something you can’t find from Mushroom Village. I secretly asked Frank to import it from the nearby town.
I’m going to give it to you.
Thanks you sooo much!
I can’t have it, it looks expensive.
Faster, hide it away! Don’t let anyone know that I gave it to you.
Really? You don’t want it? I will keep it then.
A new customer!
Sit down sit down.
Nice to meet you Tsuki. Clive here.
Where you from? There are many backpackers that stays at the cubicle hotel below. Pardon me if I don’t remember you.
I am from Mushroom Village.
I don’t remember.
Where is that? Sounds pretty far away from here.
You don’t remember where you're from? You must be drunk, kid.
I don’t get many customers at this time.
I’m glad you are here.
So did you enjoy your days here in The Great City?
Yeah! It’s so grand here.
It’s so busy~
I have never been anywhere out of the City before. I wonder what is it like...
Yeah. It’s always like this here. People rushing here and there all day everyday.
How you doing my friend?
Enjoying the city so far.
Not really. There’s nothing to do.
Really? Have you been to the BEON Mall? There’s tons of great stuff there.
True that. Usually the citizen here would just work and travel to other places for holiday.
Do you know anyone around here? Do you want to play some poker with Rahul and Krieger. They are pretty friendly.
Let's go!
Nah I am shy~
Hey guys~ This is Tsuki, you guys don’t mind adding another player right?
No pressure.
Hey Tsuki! It’ve been a while. How long you planning to stay this time round?
3-5 days?
Not too long.
Where you staying this time? The Grand Hotel got the best view of the city. But it’s so costly.
Budget trip~ I understand~
Drinks for you today Tsuki?
One Long Island.
Not today Clive~
One Long Island right up.
Sure mate~
Do you want to try my new mix? It’s full of exotic ingredients.
You sure? I am pretty sure it taste like carrot juice.
Let me tell you something about this city...
I don’t really know all the details but I do know that a detective called Sherlock is snooping around.
Word on the street is he is tracking alien activity...
You wouldn’t mind me going to visit you at Mushroom Village right? I am going on a holiday soon~ Maybe I might travel to Mushroom Village.
Do you believe in aliens?
Yeah~ I seen one before!
Not really~
Really??? You were probably drunk...
Me too~ I will only believe it when I see one...
Tsuki! You know what! I am going to give you my favourite deck of cards. Hope you will remember me when you are back at Mushroom Village...
Remember to tell your friends back in the village about me and my bar~
A moment please~ Ready in a minute.
Remember to tell your friends back in the village about me and this bar~
Shake! Shake! Shake!
Remember to tell your friends back in the village about me and this bar~
Greetings.
MoMo.
Some tea?
Sure.
Maybe next time.
Sit.
Oh.
Greetings.
Tsuki.
Hello.
Again.
Tsuki
Tea for Tsuki?
Yes please.
Maybe next time.
Have a seat.
Oh kay.
Greattings Tsuki.
The usual?
Yes please.
Not today.
Have a seat.
Oh all right.
Tsk.
How?
Day?
Good day today!
Not so good.
That's
Good.
Cheer up.
Tea is good.
For warming your body.
Drink more tea.
Momo busy.
Help Momo?
Co-owner?
Thanks!
Oh right.
Shop closes at 4.
Oh right.
Good Day!
Tsuki!
Oh right.
Can you believe it? My Lord of the Carrots book got stolen... There's definitely a thief in the village...
Do you know about the story of the lighthouse?
Yeah! About the mermaid!
I've never heard about it!
It's so sad~
Really??? You should go and have a look at the lighthouse! The story is written there.
I come here whenever I'm facing problems... It always makes me feel better~
Let's enjoy the breeze for awhile...
Looking at the ocean calms my heart...
Hoo hoo. Good evening, sir. I see that you are low on carrots.
50 carrots for 15 seconds of your time. Totally worth it right! You help me and I’ll help you!
Sure!
No thanks.
Thank you so much.
Okay...
Hey's that's a no deal.
Good evening sir. Hoo hoo... You might think it’s too good to be true...
But I am giving away 50 carrots. If you are willing to spare me 15 to 30 seconds of your time.
Really? Sounds like a good deal.
No thanks.
Thank you so much.
Really?? Don't regret.
Hey's that's a no deal.
Knock knock...
Tsuki!! How have you been these few years?
Aren’t you going to invite me in?
Sure! Come in! Come in!
There's so much to talk to you about.
Ramen! Ramen! Best ramen in town!
Haven't seen you around before? You are?
Hi there Tsuki! Hope to see you around!
Remember to come visit the stall!
Next order!
Spring Ramen! Mayo Ramen! Egg Ramen! Best Ramen! Come! Come! Come!
Best ramen in town! Which flavour do you want?
Hi there! You are . . .      .  .  . Tsuki right?
How are you doing today?
I am fine! Thank you!
This village is sooo small compared to town.
Don't forget to visit the stall to try out some ramen!
Yeah! It’s pretty boring here! One day I am going to move to The Great City!
You can find the best ramen here!
My father wanted me to be a good son and take over the Kyudojo.
But I want to do other things in life.
He is so strict and old fashioned.
Sit down for a ramen?
Sure.
Maybe later.
One serving for Tsuki coming up!
Alright.
Hey TsukI! How are you doing?
I have something that I feel is more suitable for you than me.
This is “Bullseye"! It was given to me by my dad... but... I don't even like archery... Here have it!
Shall entrust it to you now. Take good care of it.
Really? Too bad then.
It’s really tiring to live in a martial arts family. You will never understand.
It’s so strict, I get judged for whatever I do. Sometimes I just feel like traveling to another town or city to start a new life.
Shall entrust it to you now. Take good care of it.
Really? Too bad then.
Hey Tsuki! The stall has ran out of eggs!
Do you happen to have a duck egg?
Yeah I do!
Nah I don’t have one.
Omg really? Thank you so much.
It’s alright. I wonder where I can find one...
It’s alright if you don’t have it.
What do you think of the taste my ramen?
It’s the best ramen I tasted in my life.
It could be better.
You just gave me a confidence boost!
WHAT??? If you don't like my ramen, why are you always coming here to eat?
I shall go and practice more!
Chilling and listening to music by the coast is the best!
It is great to see you again. Let us catch up sometime!
Sometimes it's just about how content you are with life.
So do you enjoy the view?
Yeah! Totally!
Not really...
Me too! Make me feels like the world is so big compared to me.
Really?? You need to calm your body and soul~
Listen to the breeze~
Sometimes all you need in life is just peace~
Nice music you are playing! How long have you been playing for?
A couple of years~
I just started.
Omg really?? No wonder you are so good!
Really??? You are so talented!
. . . You~ can speak?
Can’t believe they let a rabbit in~ They belong in a farm~
If you have questions regarding whether there’s a job vacancy, you can contact my secretary...
Don’t sit so close to me~ You're ruining my appetite.
I would like to have a glass of water thanks~ Wait. You are not the waiter?
Even the best food has to be eaten with the right ambience.
Enjoy the food.
Dining in The Great City! These dishes are made by a Master Chef... Me!
Would you like to dine in?
One serving please.
Not today.
Have a seat. The food will be right up!
Alright! Sir.
Do you stay in this hotel?
Yeah~
Nope~
You must be a rich rabbit!
In order to stay here, you need a minimum of 1000 carrots!
G’day mate, fancy a round of cards?
Sure thing.
Maybe later
Take a seat.
Your loss mate.
I love playing cards.
Makes me a lot of money. Especially from my mate, Krieger.
This eye patch helps me able to focus on the game.
You can join in the next round, mate.
Quiet mate. We’re in a game right now.
... Tsuki?
Wow it's really you! Come in!
... Tsuki?
Wow it's really you! Usually I'm not open this late but please come in!

This is the village Central. There’s Bobo's ramen stall, a Yori's fox stall, Momo tea house and a geisha bar.
Mushroom village is a very peaceful town, there's much to do for a young man like you.
If you are bored you could go shopping at Yori's Fox Stall, maybe you will find something you like.
If you head east of the village will be the Mermaid Coast.
There's a very big light house right off the coast, it will be very easy to find.
Oh yeah, I forgot to mention, there's a Kyudojo that is ran by Rondo, a very old friend of mine. It's up north of the village.
However, it's only open in the morning if you want to visit.
There’s a Tranquil Garden just west of village central. It’s a very peaceful place.
It's the second best place to relax in the village.
There’s no place like home...
Mmm... Having a tea under the hot sun is the best.
Mmm...
